personal.descripcionCorta: CS student specializing in algorithms, system design, and computational graphics. Passionate about building scalable architectures and teaching complex concepts.

sobreMi.mision: Mi misión es fusionar teoría y práctica en ciencias de la computación para crear sistemas eficientes y escalables, al mismo tiempo que inspiro a otros a través de la enseñanza y el desarrollo de proyectos innovadores.
parrafos: Computer Science student at UTEC with a strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and software architecture. I focus on the intersection of theoretical computer science and practical system implementation, particularly in areas of computational graphics and simulation.

Beyond coding, I work as a teaching assistant and private tutor, helping students master complex topics in algorithms, advanced data structures, and system design. I believe in learning by building - my portfolio reflects hands-on projects ranging from physics simulators to full-stack architectures.
sobreMi.enseñanza: Teaching reinforces my own understanding. As a TA for Data Structures & Algorithms at UTEC, I've developed pedagogical methods to make abstract concepts concrete through visualization and interactive examples.

logros: Proyecto destacado: Optimización de algoritmos de asignación en mapas con CGAL
